(7) ensure the narrative adheres to the horizon (0–12 months) and format: convert to a compact 1–2 paragraph synthesis plus a 4–5 item watch-list, with every assertion traced to one of the IDs in SOURCE MATERIAL and no new facts; These edits will produce a tightly reasoned, first-principles-backed, quantitatively anchored cross-topic view with a precise, action-ready watch-list.
